Hirescope Chrome Extension: Simplify Your Online Forms with Verified Data

The Hirescope Chrome extension is designed to save you time and effort when filling out online forms. With this extension, you can automatically populate any form on any website with your verified data from Hirescope. Whether it's employment history, personal details, or professional qualifications, the extension pulls accurate information directly from your Hirescope profile.

Benefits of Using the Hirescope Extension:
